								Home
								



			
					
				Learning Management System (LMS)			
					
		
		
	
Learning Management System (LMS)Our LMS software offers comprehensive features for students, instructors, and administrators.
Students can access diverse learning materials, personalized learning paths, progress tracking dashboards, 24/7 access, manage profiles, review purchase history, and engage in discussions and blogs.
Instructors can easily create and manage courses, communicate securely with students, and utilize analytics for insights into sales and course performance.
Administrators have control through an admin dashboard, user management, system configuration, data backup, and detailed reporting.
Core modules include Learning Management, Engagement and Collaboration, Profile Management, Blog, Course Management, Reporting, Admin, Analytics, Enrollment, Users, and Payment, providing a robust and efficient learning management system.


Contact NowMaterials & Paths
Access to Learning Materials: Students can access a wide variety of educational content such as videos, quizzes, and other multimedia resources to enhance their learning experience.
Personalized Learning Paths: The system creates customized learning journeys for each student based on their individual needs and progress, ensuring a tailored educational experience.
Progress Tracking Dashboards: Interactive dashboards that allow students to monitor their progress in real-time, providing insights into completed modules and upcoming lessons.
Material Review: Students can revisit and review course materials at any time to reinforce their understanding and retention of the subject matter.


Let's EnrollCourses & Enrollment
Course Management: Add, approve, and update course content, including lessons, sections, and quizzes.
Content Tools: Utilize tools for content organization and management to streamline the course creation process.
Promotions: Add and manage coupons to offer discounted and promotional prices to students.
Enrollment Management: Oversee course enrollment processes and view enrollment histories to track student participation.


Read MoreCart and Purchase










Course Selection: Students can browse through available courses and add desired courses to their cart for future purchase.
Cart Management: Easily manage the cart by adding or removing courses as needed before proceeding to checkout.
Save for Later: Option to save courses in the cart for a later purchase, allowing students to plan their learning journey.
Secure Checkout: A secure and user-friendly checkout process that guides students through purchasing their selected courses.
Multiple Payment Options: Various payment methods available, including credit/debit cards, online banking, and e-wallets to provide flexibility.
Order Confirmation: Immediate confirmation of the purchase with details of the transaction and access to the course materials.
Transaction History: Students can view their complete purchase history, including transaction details and status of each purchase.












Buy Now
Choose GO-Globe for a brighter tomorrow and a better future.The best way to predict the future is to create it.Let’s future together
